TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataGridViewEditingControl

summary.span: 為裝載於 之儲存格的控制項定義通用功能。

span.span: Defines common functionality for controls that are hosted within cells of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個介面會實作控制項，例如和，所裝載的對應資料格，例如和，當它們處於編輯模式。This interface is implemented by controls, such as and , that are hosted by corresponding cells, such as and , when they are in edit mode. 資料格可以裝載編輯的控制項集合的型別及其屬性表示編輯控制項類型。Cell types that can host editing controls set their property to a representing the editing control type. 當儲存格進入編輯模式時，請執行下列步驟：When the cell enters edit mode, the following steps are performed: 1. 控制項建立的編輯控制項類型的執行個體。The control creates an instance of the editing control type. 2. 控制項會呼叫資料格方法。The control calls the cell method. 您可以覆寫這個方法，以傳送至編輯控制項的儲存格的值。You can override this method to transfer the cell value to the editing control. 3. 控制項會呼叫編輯控制項方法並傳入目前的儲存格的樣式。The control calls the editing control method and passes in the cell's current style. 您可以實作這個方法，以初始化編輯控制項的外觀，使其符合儲存格的外觀。You can implement this method to initialize the appearance of the editing control so that it matches the appearance of the cell. 4. 控制項會呼叫編輯控制項方法。The control calls the editing control method. 您可以實作此方法來進行最後調整至編輯控制項，例如選取控制項值。You can implement this method to make final adjustments to the editing control, such as selecting the control value. 如需有關實作，請參閱[How to： 在 Windows Form DataGridView 儲存格的主控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md)。For more information about implementing , see [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md). 資料格類型，例如提供使用者介面 (UI) 的指定值，而不需要裝載編輯的控制項實作介面。Cell types such as that provide a user interface (UI) for specifying values without hosting an editing control implement the interface. 在此情況下會顯示 UI 不管儲存格是否處於編輯模式。The UI in this case is displayed regardless of whether the cell is in edit mode. 其他資料格類型，例如、 提供 UI，但不是會儲存使用者指定的值。Other cell types, such as , provide a UI but do not store user-specified values. 在此情況下，資料格類型未實作或裝載編輯控制項。In this case, the cell type does not implement or host an editing control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例提供衍生自這個介面的實作。The following code example provides an implementation of this interface that derives from . 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 在 Windows Form DataGridView 儲存格的主控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#300](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/CS/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.cs#300)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#300](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/VB/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.vb#300)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ApplyCellStyleToEditingControl(class System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle dataGridViewCellStyle) cil managed

param.name: dataGridViewCellStyle
param.span: 要當做 UI 模型使用的 。

span.span: The to use as the model for the UI.

summary.span: 變更控制項的使用者介面 (UI)，使其與指定的儲存格樣式一致。

span.span: Changes the control's user interface (UI) to be consistent with the specified cell style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，這個方法的實作會設定編輯控制項，例如字型、 背景色彩和前景色彩的 UI 屬性中的對應屬性的值為`dataGridViewCellStyle`，這是用於裝載的儲存格樣式控制項。Typically, an implementation of this method will set UI properties for the editing control, such as font, background color, and foreground color, to the values of corresponding properties in the `dataGridViewCellStyle`, which is the style used for the cell hosting the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會提供這個成員的實作。The following code example provides an implementation of this member. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 在 Windows Form DataGridView 儲存格的主控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#303](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/CS/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.cs#303)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#303](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/VB/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.vb#303)]

summary.span: 取得或設定包含儲存格的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the that contains the cell.

value.span: ，其中含有進行編輯的 ，但如果沒有任何相關的 ，則為 。

span.span: The that contains the that is being edited; if there is no associated .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ EditingControlFormattedValue { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定編輯器所修改之儲存格的格式化值。

span.span: Gets or sets the formatted value of the cell being modified by the editor.
An that represents the formatted value of the cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式化的值代表的值，因為它會顯示在控制項的使用者介面。The formatted value represents the value as it is displayed in the control's user interface. 格式化的值可能不同絕對值以及甚至是資料類型的控制項中包含的實際值。The formatted value may be different in absolute value and even data type from the actual value contained in the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會提供這個成員的實作。The following code example provides an implementation of this member. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 在 Windows Form DataGridView 儲存格的主控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#301](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/CS/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.cs#301)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#301](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/VB/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.vb#301)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int EditingControlRowIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定裝載儲存格之父資料列的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the hosting cell's parent row.

value.span: 含有儲存格之資料列的索引，但如果沒有父資料列，則為 –1。

span.span: The index of the row that contains the cell, or –1 if there is no parent row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面並未定義對應`ColumnIndex`屬性。The interface does not define a corresponding `ColumnIndex` property. 您可以使用屬性，以擷取父控制，並使用屬性來判斷資料列和資料行索引的現用儲存格。You can use the property to retrieve the parent control and use the property to determine the row and column indexes of the active cell.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EditingControlValueChanged { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出編輯控制項的值是否與裝載儲存格的值不同。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the value of the editing control differs from the value of the hosting cell.

value.span: 如果控制項的值與儲存格的值不同，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the value of the control differs from the cell value; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性設定為`true`指出裝載儲存格的狀態已變更，而且其使用者介面 (UI) 需要更新以反映這個變更值。The property is set to `true` to indicate that the hosting cell's state has changed and its user interface (UI) needs to be updated to reflect this change in value. 主控儲存格或資料表將會重設此屬性為`false`之後更新。The owning cell or table will reset this property to `false` after an update.

para.span: 傳回這個屬性的實作中不會自動變更顯示的值。

span.span: Returning in your implementation of this property does not automatically change the displayed value.

para.span: 值變更，編輯控制項中，您必須通知變更所傳遞的至方法。

span.span: When the value changes in the editing control, you must notify the of the change by passing to the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool EditingControlWantsInputKey (System.Windows.Forms.Keys keyData, bool dataGridViewWantsInputKey);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool EditingControlWantsInputKey(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Keys keyData, bool dataGridViewWantsInputKey) cil managed
Public Function EditingControlWantsInputKey (keyData As Keys, dataGridViewWantsInputKey As Boolean) As Boolean

span.span: A that represents the key that was pressed.

param.name: dataGridViewWantsInputKey
param.span: 當 想要處理 keyData 中的 時；則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: when the wants to process the in keyData; otherwise, .

summary.span: 判斷指定的按鍵是否為編輯控制項應該處理的標準輸入按鍵，或是 應該處理的特殊按鍵。

span.span: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key that the editing control should process or a special key that the should process.

returns.span: 如果指定按鍵為編輯控制項應該處理的標準輸入按鍵，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the specified key is a regular input key that should be handled by the editing control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 編輯控制項實作這個方法，以判斷哪一個輸入的索引鍵應該處理由控制項，以及哪個輸入索引鍵應該由。An editing control implements this method to determine which input keys should be processed by the control, and which input keys should be processed by the . 方法透過呼叫。The method is called by the . 將會傳入`true`如`dataGridViewWantsInputKey`時，它可以處理`keyData`。The will pass in `true` for `dataGridViewWantsInputKey` when it can process the `keyData`. 如果編輯控制項可以讓處理`keyData`，應該傳回`false`時`dataGridViewWantsInputKey`是`true`。If the editing control can let the handle the `keyData`, should return `false` when `dataGridViewWantsInputKey` is `true`. 其他實作可能會忽略`dataGridViewWantsInputKey`值`true`及處理`keyData`編輯控制項中。Other implementations of may ignore a `dataGridViewWantsInputKey` value of `true` and handle the `keyData` in the editing control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會提供這個成員的實作。The following code example provides an implementation of this member. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 在 Windows Form DataGridView 儲存格的主控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#305](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/CS/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.cs#305)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#305](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/VB/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.vb#305)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EditingPanelCursor As Cursor
public: property System::Windows::Forms::Cursor ^ EditingPanelCursor { System::Windows::Forms::Cursor ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得當滑鼠指標放在 上方，但不在編輯控制項上方時所用的游標。

span.span: Gets the cursor used when the mouse pointer is over the but not over the editing control.

value.span: ，表示用於編輯面板中的滑鼠指標。

span.span: A that represents the mouse pointer used for the editing panel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 編輯面板是主機編輯控制何時控制項處於編輯模式。The editing panel is the that hosts the editing control when the control is in edit mode. 實際的編輯控制項不一定會涵蓋整個區域之編輯面板。The actual editing control may not cover the entire area of the editing panel. 在此情況下，實作應該傳回滑鼠指標停留在面板上，但不是在控制項上時要使用資料指標。In this case, the implementation should return the cursor to use when the mouse pointer is over the panel but not over the control. 一般而言，您會想要傳回相同的控制項使用的資料指標。Typically, you will want to return the same cursor that the control uses. 如果您想要變更指標位於控制項上時顯示的游標，則必須設定屬性。If you want to change the cursor that appears when the pointer is over the control, you must set the property. 您可以將此建構函式中實作中，或者您可以將它設定實作。You can set this in the constructor of the implementation, or you can set it in the implementation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會提供這個成員的實作。The following code example provides an implementation of this member. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 在 Windows Form DataGridView 儲存格的主控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#311](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/CS/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.cs#311)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#311](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/VB/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.vb#311)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetEditingControlFormattedValue(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts context) cil managed
Public Function GetEditingControlFormattedValue (context As DataGridViewDataErrorContexts) As Object

param.name: context
param.span: 值的位元組合，指定需要資料的內容。

span.span: A bitwise combination of values that specifies the context in which the data is needed.

summary.span: 擷取儲存格的格式化值。

span.span: Retrieves the formatted value of the cell.

returns.span: ，表示儲存格內容的格式化版本。

span.span: An that represents the formatted version of the cell contents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式化的值代表的值，因為它會顯示在控制項的使用者介面。The formatted value represents the value as it is displayed in the control's user interface. 格式化的值可能不同絕對值以及甚至是資料類型的控制項中包含的實際值。The formatted value may be different in absolute value and even data type from the actual value contained in the control. 若要設定控制項的格式化的值，請使用屬性。To set the formatted value of the control, use the property.

para.span: 在您實作這個方法傳回的值變更不會自動變更顯示的值。

span.span: Changing the return value in your implementation of this method does not automatically change the displayed value.

para.span: 值變更，編輯控制項中，您必須通知變更所傳遞的至方法。

span.span: When the value changes in the editing control, you must notify the of the change by passing to the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PrepareEditingControlForEdit(bool selectAll) cil managed

param.name: selectAll
param.span: 表示選取所有的儲存格內容，否則為 。

span.span: to select all of the cell's content; otherwise, .

summary.span: 準備目前所選的儲存格來編輯。

span.span: Prepares the currently selected cell for editing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的目的是準備進行編輯的控制項和其內容。The purpose of this method is to prepare the control and its contents for editing. 例如，您可能想要放置插入點的內容、 結尾或變更內容的對齊方式。For example, you might want to put the insertion point at the end of the contents, or change how the contents are aligned.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RepositionEditingControlOnValueChange As Boolean
public: property bool RepositionEditingControlOnValueChange { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出每當值變更時儲存格內容是否需要重新調整位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cell contents need to be repositioned whenever the value changes.

value.span: 如果內容需要重新調整位置，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the contents need to be repositioned; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有些情況需要儲存格的內容調整值變更時。Some situations require that cell contents reposition when the value changes. 例如，儲存格的內容可能需要調整資料格中將文字換行，且內容會變成較大的位置。For example, cell contents may need to reposition when a cell wraps text and the contents become larger.
